doc.field: Repairs & Extension to Building on Pier A; Break Water at Pier A (3 blueprints)
Repairs & Extension to Building on Pier A; Break Water at Pier A (3 blueprints)

The "repairs" blueprint no longer has a label due to fragmenting; a date written on the reverse indicates August 1900. There are two blueprints concerning the breakwater: One of the overall plan blueprint, labeled as Tube 329a, letter W, but which has lost a date due to fragmenting; and a small blueprint of the breakwater's special coping stones, labeled as Tube 329a, letter P (undated).
